attributes.additional_details: Reopen the park with patrol and let people know they cannot sit in the park for any period of time
attributes.background: Reopen the park whilst the corona virus situation continues in order for everyone to do exercise and get fresh air. With the park close people are using roads to get exercise and are therefore closer in contact and the disease will spread more quickly.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the local council and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

In any case, Victoria Park has reopened since you started your petition.
